announcements.details: Read the commentary on the readings for the 6th Sunday in Ordinary Time.
announcements.title: Commentary: 6th Sunday in Ordinary Time

announcements.details: There will be ONE mass on Sunday, 23rd February, 2025. Offertory will be led by the Monday Borns and Legion of Mary. Bidding Prayers will be led by the Lectors.
announcements.title: Mass Schedule: 7th Sunday in Ordinary Time

announcements.details: Life in the Spirit Seminar starts on Sunday 16th February, 2025. Registration is still ongoing at the church.
announcements.title: Life in the Spirit Seminar

announcements.details: There will be In His Presence next Sunday, 23rd February, 2025 at 6pm. Come with a heart full gratitude and praise.
announcements.title: In His Presence

announcements.details: Ash Wednesday falls on 5th March, 2025. There will be evening Mass at 7pm on the day. Parishioners who have their last year's palm branches are encouraged to drop them with the administrator during the week.
announcements.title: Ash Wednesday

announcements.details: The St Bakhita Marriage School opens on 16th February, 2025. Prospective counselees who wish to have their marriages solemnized in 2025 should please pick up registration forms from the office of the Rector.
announcements.title: St Bakhita Marriage School

sacraments.details: Kindly contact the church office to register for Infant Baptism
sacraments.subtitle: First Saturday of every month, after Grotto Mass
sacraments.title: Infant Baptism

sacraments.subtitle: The St Bakhita Marriage School opens on 16th February, 2025.
sacraments.title: Marriage School

sacraments.subtitle: By appointment with the priest in charge.
sacraments.title: Confession
